summary: This is an email chain from July 2021 regarding a FOIA request related to the Epstein case. It involves coordination between a U.S. Attorney's Office and the Office of Inspector General about transcripts of interviews with two BOP staff members, Tova Noel and Michael Thomas, conducted as part of an ongoing investigation.

persons.name: Nick
persons.context: Sender of the email chain, working at the U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York, involved in coordinating a FOIA-related matter regarding interview transcripts.

persons.name: Tova Noel
persons.context: Mentioned as having been interviewed by the Office of Inspector General as part of an ongoing investigation; transcripts of her interview are subject to a FOIA request.

persons.name: Michael Thomas
persons.context: Mentioned as having been interviewed by the Office of Inspector General as part of an ongoing investigation; transcripts of his interview are subject to a FOIA request.

connections.description: Both were interviewed by the Office of Inspector General as part of the same ongoing investigation, suggesting they are BOP staff members involved in related matters.
Nick, as an AUSA, is involved in a FOIA request concerning the transcript of Tova Noel's interview with the OIG.
Nick, as an AUSA, is involved in a FOIA request concerning the transcript of Michael Thomas's interview with the OIG.

events.title: FOIA Coordination on OIG Interview Transcripts
events.description: Email correspondence regarding a FOIA request for transcripts of interviews conducted by the Office of Inspector General with BOP staff Tova Noel and Michael Thomas as part of an ongoing investigation.

locations: One St. Andrew's Plaza, New York, New York 10007
keyFacts: The Office of Inspector General interviewed Tova Noel and Michael Thomas as part of an ongoing investigation.
A FOIA request is being processed regarding the turnover of transcripts of those interviews to the Bureau of Prisons (BOP).
The correspondence involves an Assistant U.S. Attorney from the Southern District of New York coordinating on this FOIA matter.
The document indicates ongoing investigative and transparency efforts related to the Epstein case in July 2021.
